description:
cmd/cgo: fix line number
        Fixes issue 4019.

messages.text:
On Wed, Jun 19, 2013 at 1:38 AM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Is this still alive?
>
no.

the issue has already been fixed.

i will close it.

btw, qopher will prompt for owners even to CLs that haven't been mailed out?
so in the future, if i don't mean to mail CL for review, i shouldn't set
reviewer
to golang-dev? what about cc?

sometimes i publish preliminary CLs for others to try out, but I don't want
it
to be reviewed.

Putting golang-dev onto the Reviewer or CC line is tantamount to sending it for review. If you want to share a CL with people, just create it and mail them the link without putting golang-dev on the CL.

When you eventually run hg mail, the codereview plugin will add golang-dev automatically.

This was not clear to me from http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html. I've 
always filled out To/CC when initially creating the CL.

Creating or uploading the change uploads a copy of the diff to the code 
> review server, but it does not notify anyone about it. 


Should this or other portions of the contribution page be adjusted to 
account for a new qopher-based workflow?

On Friday, June 21, 2013 9:51:47 AM UTC-7, rsc wrote:
>
> Putting golang-dev onto the Reviewer or CC line is tantamount to sending 
> it for review. If you want to share a CL with people, just create it and 
> mail them the link without putting golang-dev on the CL. 
>
> When you eventually run hg mail, the codereview plugin will add 
> golang-dev automatically. 
>
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/6498055/ 
>

This page is accurate, I cannot see instructions to add 'golang-dev'
as a reviewer.

On Mon, Jun 24, 2013 at 5:06 PM, Caleb Spare <cespare@gmail.com> wrote:
> This was not clear to me from http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html. I've
> always filled out To/CC when initially creating the CL.
>
>> Creating or uploading the change uploads a copy of the diff to the code
>> review server, but it does not notify anyone about it.
>
>
> Should this or other portions of the contribution page be adjusted to
> account for a new qopher-based workflow?
>
>
> On Friday, June 21, 2013 9:51:47 AM UTC-7, rsc wrote:
>>
>> Putting golang-dev onto the Reviewer or CC line is tantamount to sending
>> it for review. If you want to share a CL with people, just create it and
>> mail them the link without putting golang-dev on the CL.
>>
>> When you eventually run hg mail, the codereview plugin will add
>> golang-dev automatically.
>>
>>
>> https://codereview.appspot.com/6498055/
